dmca.title: Notice of Copyright Infringement: Cease and Desist
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Christopher Heng [mailto:legal@thesitewizard.com] 
Sent: Tuesday, June 07, 2005 10:51 PM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Notice of Copyright Infringement: Cease and Desist

To:
ThePlanet.com
1333 Stemmons Freeway
Suite 110
Dallas, TX 75207

Attention of Lance Crosby, Esq.

Dear Sir,

NOTICE OF COPYRIGHT INFRINGEMENT: CEASE AND DESIST

A website, designated webpromotiontutorials.com (IP address:
69.93.202.216, 216.69-93-202.reverse.theplanet.com) hosted on your servers,
retrieved on May 15, 2005, infringes on my exclusive rights.

The pages that infringe on my copyright are:
http://www.webpromotiontutorials.com/web-site-promotion-tutorials/meta-robot
-tag.shtm
http://www.webpromotiontutorials.com/web-site-promotion-tutorials/meta-keywo
rd.shtm


Those pages contain content that are modified copies of my page on:
http://www.thesitewizard.com/archive/metatags.shtml

In addition, the page
http://www.webpromotiontutorials.com/web-site-promotion-tutorials/php-feed-b
ack-form111.shtm
contains a script that is a modified copy of an earlier version of the PHP
script generated by my online script generator at:
http://www.thesitewizard.com/wizards/feedbackform.shtml

webpromotiontutorials.com has neither asked nor received my permission to
use the works, and have thus violated my copyright.

Please remove the referenced material from your service and take other
appropriate action against the account holder to prevent future
infringement. This letter serves as actual notice of infringement in the
event of legal proceedings. The information in this notification is
accurate, and under penalty of perjury, I state that I am the owner of an
exclusive right infringed by the specified material. Please contact me
promptly to confirm the action you have taken.

Christopher Heng
Copyright Owner
thesitewizard.com
Email: legal@thesitewizard.com
